title: Why would someone hack my account spend money on it and then refund it?
body:
I was logging into my glyph account when i was told i was banned

 i haven't been online since 3 days of playing trove in late september 

I log into my email and im told my account was compromised money was put on the account used and then refunded. 

im not mad im just really curious

what was the point of this?

bonus topic: why the hell do people not read posts and then act like they know what the hell they are talking about?
